title: German parliamentarian dismisses CBDCs in favor of Bitcoin as global digital money debate rages on
description:
German Parliamentarian Joana Cotar spoke out against introducing a Euro-based central bank digital currency (CBDC), claiming that “no one needs it.” Cotar stated in a speech on Nov. 9 that the ECB and politicians backing a digital euro are doing so because they want total surveillance of the monetary system. Bitcoin is healthy money Cotar […]

The post German parliamentarian dismisses CBDCs in favor of Bitcoin as global digital money debate rages on appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Bitcoin Fees Climb 150% in 3 Days as Block Space Grows More Expensive
description: Transaction fees within the Bitcoin network have surged considerably, eclipsing the figures recorded merely three days prior. A transfer deemed high-priority, which formerly cost an average of $3.38, now demands a fee of $8.46. This significant increase was recorded on Thursday, November 9, 2023, at precisely 9:52 a.m. Eastern Time. This upsurge coincides with a […]

title: Binance CEO focused on improving defi wallets
description: Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao announced plans to enhance the security and usability of defi wallets, acknowledging current weaknesses and committing to future improvements.

title: OneCoin compliance head pleads guilty in multi-billion dollar crypto scam
description: Irina Dilkinska entered a guilty plea weeks after OneCoin co-founder Karl Sebastian Greenwood was sentenced to 20 years in prison for a multi-billion dollar crypto pyramid scheme.

title: Institutional Entry Sparks Fears of Bitcoin Split – Samson Mow Speaks Out
description: Samson Mow advises Bitcoin users to keep their assets in personal custody to ensure their safety and authenticity. Bitcoin may split into two types, with Institutional Bitcoin held by firms like BlackRock and Normal Bitcoin remaining freely used by the public. Samson Mow, Chief Strategy Officer of Blockstream and CEO of Pixelmatic, has recently highlighted [...]

title: NEAR and Polygon Labs Partner to Bridge NEAR Protocol and Ethereum Liquidity with zkWASM
description: The NEAR Foundation and Polygon Labs are collaborating to develop zkWASM, enhancing security and interoperability for blockchain technology. This partnership aims to connect NEAR Protocol with Ethereum, allowing for shared liquidity across blockchain networks. The NEAR Foundation has partnered with Polygon Labs to create zkWASM, a new zero-knowledge-proof technology for WASM-based blockchains. This collaboration was [...]

title: Zircuit, New ZK Rollup Backed by Pioneering Layer Two Research, Launches Public Testnet
description:
November 9, 2023 – Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands Zircuit – a new zero-knowledge rollup backed by pioneering layer two research – today announced the launch of its public testnet. Zircuit is fully EVM-compatible, supports existing Ethereum DApps and wallets and allows any DApp on Ethereum to deploy on Zircuit with minimal changes. To celebrate the […]

The post Zircuit, New ZK Rollup Backed by Pioneering Layer Two Research, Launches Public Testnet appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
